Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing.util

Class EditingRunner

java.lang.Object
org.autogui.base.mapping.ScheduledTaskRunner<Object>
org.autogui.swing.util.EditingRunner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, FocusListener, InputMethodListener, KeyListener, EventListener, ChangeListener, DocumentListener
public class EditingRunner extends ScheduledTaskRunner<Object> implements DocumentListener, KeyListener, ActionListener, FocusListener, ChangeListener, InputMethodListener
the sub-class of the executor with implementing various listeners
